thread.title: Robert C. Brewster
thread.title_full: WebStarts reviewed by Robert C. Brewster

author: Robert C. Brewster
title: Robert C. Brewster
text: My wife had been bothering me for awhile to build my own web site since I am a writer as well as a voice and film actor. So I sat down on Sunday afternoon and played around for a few hours. The day I was ready for my domain name and built the site in 2 hours with no prior experience in web building. To be honest I was terrified at first but it turned out to be so easy to put together and change and update anytime I want.
